metadata.title: Weston Original Jerky Gun
features: The Original Jerky Gun Can Hold Up To 1
Made of quality construction and materials
description: The Original Jerky Gun Can Hold Up To 1 1/2 Lbs. Of Meat, Jerky Gun Is Equipped With An Easy-Squeeze Trigger , Comes With 2 Stainless Steel Attachments; 1/2" Diameter Double Snack Stick, 1/18" x 3/4" Double Jerky Strip, Features A Sausage Funnel For Making Sausage As Well, Includes Stomper For Easy Loading, Comes With Cleaning Brush Set, Original Jerky Gun Also Comes With 12 OZ Weston Jerky Dust Classic Seasoning.
